ai-patthana14.8:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_0: Improperly gives rise to unarisen teaching.
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_1: Improperly gives rise to the teachings.
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_2: I won’t give rise to unsuitable things. And it doesn’t arise because of not.
ai-patthana14.8:2.1_0: Three things are the basis for ending ...
